title: Year in Review 2017?

embed.description: Post with 1 views. Year in Review 2017 not working.

body: Year in review is not working for me. I open up the client and tried to look at my Year In Review but it's just black. The entire client works except that. I initiated a full repair but still. I relogged, restarted pc, nothing. Help? Please view the photo above, it's a screenshot of my client. I really want to look at my year in review. please help!

replies.body: Hmmmm that's kind of odd. The client might not be grabbing the info from the website correctly, no worries though. Try pulling up the actual web page through this link-> https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/year-in-review-2017#/
Not working in link too. Thanks tho
